name: Baloo
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Gaston
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TOP THAT! Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, chosen opposing character can't challenge and must quest if able during their next turn.

name: Rajah
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: He's determined to protect his friends, no matter what forms they take.

name: Webby Vanderquack
text: I’VE READ ABOUT THIS While you have a character or location in play with a card under them, this character gets +1 {L}.
flavor_text: "If I'm correct, and I know I am, these are the plants from chapter 6 of Hana's Herborium."

name: Gurgi
text: HAPPY DAY When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text: In its reflection he could see the future: Moments from now, they'd be less hungry.

name: Mrs. Beakley
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text:
Initiator of the STOP protocol: Strategic
Termination of Progression.

name: Bagheera
flavor_text: Among the strange things he had seen in the Mysterious Ruins, the luminescent river remained the most troubling. It looked like water and moved like water, while seeming... different.

name: Shanti
text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
flavor_text: Her song winds through the forest, the gentle melody soothing the hearts of all who hear it.

name: Flash
text:
HOLD... YOUR HORSES This character enters play exerted.
DEEP RESEARCH Whenever this character quests, you may give chosen Detective character +2 {S} this turn.

name: Taran
text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
FOLLOW THE PIG Whenever this character quests, you may return a character card named Hen Wen from your discard to your hand.

name: Ariel
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
COMMAND PERFORMANCE Once during your turn, whenever you play a song, if there's a card under this character, you may draw a card.

name: Scrooge Mcduck
text:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Scrooge McDuck.)
SPECULATION Whenever you play a character or location with Boost, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under them.

name: Simba
text:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TIMELY ALLIANCE Whenever you put a card under this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Goofy
text: THE PERFECT TRAP When you play this character, choose an opposing character that gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: "If you want to beat a ghost, you have to think like a ghost."

name: Della Duck
text: HERE TO HELP When you play this character, you may ready chosen character with Boost. If you do, they can’t quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: "I promise I'm coming home, somehow. Nothing can stop Della Duck!"

name: Goofy
text:
Shift 5 {I} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Goofy.)
HOT PURSUIT When you play this character and whenever he quests, each opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: Gazelle
text:
Singer 7 (This character counts as cost 7 to sing songs.)
CROWD FAVORITE When you play this character, you may put a song card from your discard on the top of your deck.

name: Search For Clues
text: The player or players with the most cards in their hands choose and discard 2 cards. If you have a Detective character in play, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text:
Judy: "Wait, are these lorebook pages?"
Nick: "Looks like it, Carrots. Maybe that's where the whispers come from!"

name: Or Rewrite History!
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return a character card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: Every day they're out there making DuckTales! Woo-oo!

name: Della's Moon Lullaby
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen opposing character gets -2 {S} until the start of your next turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Life is strange and vast

name: Recovered Page
text:
WHAT IS TO COME When you play this item, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
WHISPERED POWER 1 {I}, Banish this item — Put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.

name: Webby's Diary
text: LATEST ENTRY Whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.
flavor_text: "A girl needs a place to put her innermost thoughts and feelings—not to mention trap designs!" —Webby

name: The Black Cauldron
text:
THE CAULDRON CALLS {E}, 1 {I} — Put a character card from your discard under this item faceup.
RISE AND JOIN ME! {E}, 1 {I} – This turn, you may play characters from under this item.

name: Munchings And Crunchings
text:
WHAT A JUICY APPLE {E} - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
COME ON OUT You pay 1 {I} less to play characters named Gurgi.

name: The Horned King
text: Shift 2 {} (You may pay 2 {} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Horned King.) ARISE! Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand, then choose and discard a card.

name: The Horned King
text:
Shift 2 {I} (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Horned King.)
ARISE! Whenever one of your other characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand, then choose and discard a card.

name: Gwythaint
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SWOOPING STRIKE Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.

name: The Horned King
flavor_text: "Untried courage is no match for his evil." –Dallben

name: Cauldron Born
flavor_text:
"My beloved warriors have come to life! All the dead of centuries past! Never has anyone created an army like this!"
—The Horned King

name: Demona
text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Magica De Spell
text: DARK INCANTATION When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from chosen player’s discard into their deck.
flavor_text: "My power is still not enough. I need something more. Something . . . shadowy."

name: Lena Sabrewing
text: ARCANE CONNECTION When you play this character, if you have a character or location in play with a card under them, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "This is a strange kind of magic. These 'whispers' seem independent, but they're still incomplete."

name: Iago
text: Challenger +5 (While this character is challenging, it gets +5 {S}.)
flavor_text: "That's it — now I'm really mad!"

name: Violet Sabrewing
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: At last, an opportunity to earn my Mysterious Ruins Exploration badge!

name: Elsa
text: CLOSER LOOK When you play this character, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "This world still has secrets to uncover."

name: Duckworth
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
FINAL ACT During your turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.

name: Nibs
text: LOOK WHO'S BACK When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.
flavor_text: "That was fun! Let's do it again!"

name: The Horned King
text: GRAND MACHINATIONS During your turn, if 1 or more cards have left a player's discard this turn, this character gets +2 {L}.
flavor_text: "Only moments away from victory."

name: Creeper
flavor_text: "Yes! Things are going exactly as sire planned. Soon the cauldron will be ours—I mean his."

name: Magica De Spell
text: MYSTICAL MANIPULATION Whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen oppposing character.
flavor_text: "I am the stuff of nightmares lurking in the hidden recesses of your mind!"

name: Magica De Spell
text: Shift 7 {I} (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.) SHADOW'S GRASP When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may draw 4 cards.

name: Demona
text:
AD SAXUM COMMUTATE When you play this character, exert all opposing characters. Then, each player with fewer than 3 cards in their hand draws until they have 3.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Hades
text: WHAT D'YA SAY? When you play this character, you may choose an opposing character. If you do, draw 2 cards unless that character's player puts that card on the bottom of their deck.
flavor_text: "I'm kind of on a schedule here—I got plans for August."

name: Olaf
text: SECOND CHANCE When this character leaves play, you may return chosen character of yours to your hand.
flavor_text: "Here, hold this while I get help. Try not to go anywhere."

name: Merlin
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
LEGACY OF LEARNING When this character is banished in a challenge, if he had a card under him, draw 2 cards.

name: Ursula
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
SLIPPERY SPELL While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

name: Cheshire Cat
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
IT'S LOADS OF FUN Whenever you put a card under this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

name: Begone!
text: Return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.
flavor_text: "Alakazam, alakazook, send this page back to its book!"

name: Can't Hold It Back Anymore
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Exert chosen opposing character. Move all damage counters from all other characters to that character.

name: Swooping Strike
text: Each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.
flavor_text: You could try to run . . .

name: Fragile As A Flower
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Exert chosen character with cost 2 or less. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

name: Junior Woodchuck Guidebook
text: THE BOOK KNOWS EVERYTHING {E}, 1 {I}, Banish this item – Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text:
"How come ghosts get a whole section, but not were-ducks?!"
–Huey

name: The Great Illuminary
text: STARTLING DISCOVERY Characters gain "{E} - Draw a card" while here.
flavor_text:
"Remember, we're looking for clues to who tore up the lorebook pages."
—Elisa Maza

name: Baloo
flavor_text: "I tell ya, for a spooky forest, this place is all right. Plenty of berries, lots of trees for back-scratching . . . A bear could do a lot worse."

name: Big Nose
flavor_text:
"Thou art pretty as a brawl
Thy hair's as dark as a moonless night
Thy cheeks the red of leaves in fall—
I love to sit and watch you fight"

name: Flotsam
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "You're in our world now."

name: Webby Vanderquack
text: CONTAGIOUS ENERGY When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "It's happening! IT'S HAPPENING! There's a whisper nearby, and I get to see it!"

name: Finnick
text: YOU BETTER RUN When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to return chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand.

name: Vladimir
text: HIGH STANDARDS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.
flavor_text: His commitment to excellent craftsmanship is unparalleled.

name: Flintheart Glomgold
text: TRY ME While you have a character or location in play with a card under them, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavor_text: "Long live Glomgold! Glomgold! Glomgold!"

name: Jetsam
text: AMBUSH FROM THE DEEP When you play this character, deal 3 damage to chosen opposing damaged character.
flavor_text: "You're coming with us."

name: Hook Hand
flavor_text: "You're a peculiar Glimmer, aren't you?" he said to the Whisper, who lingered uncertainly in the doorway. "Welcome to the tavern 'The Squeaky Duckling'!"

name: Kaa
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: Hard to tell where the branches end and where the serpent begins.

name: Emily Quackfaster
text: RECOMMENDED READING When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.
flavor_text: "Hana's Herborium? The book that Illumineer wrote? Our only copy has been checked out, sadly."

name: Flynn Rider
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck face down under this character.)
I'LL TAKE THAT As long as this character has at least one card under it, it gets +2 {S} and +1 {L}.

name: Bellwether
text: VENDETTA When this character is challenged and banished, put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.
flavor_text: "I will have sweet revenge!"

name: Quack, The Crash Pilot
text: NOT ON THE MAP When you play this character, you may banish a Location of your choice.
flavor_text: You can't spell 'crash landing' without 'landing'!

name: Baloo
text:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Baloo.)
ROLL WITH IT When you play this character, choose one:
- Each player draws a card.
- Each player chooses and discards a card.

name: Megara
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I'LL BE FINE While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains "Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card."

name: Goldie O'gilt
text:
CLAIM JUMPER When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a location card of your choice.
STRIKE GOLD Whenever this character quests, you may put a location card from chosen player's discard on the bottom of their deck to gain 1 lore.

name: Scrooge Mcduck
text:
BACKUP PLAN When you play this character, draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
ON THE MOVE When this character is challenged, return this card to your hand. (No damage is dealt in that challenge.)

name: Akela
text: AHEAD OF THE PACK 1 {I} — This character gets +1 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "Follow me, if you can," Akela said, bounding into the Bitterwood. "The hunt is on!"

name: Goofy
text:
EVEN THE SCORE Whenever one of your other Emerald characters is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
PROVIDE COVER Your other Emerald characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

name: Little John
text:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
READY TO RASSLE Whenever you put a card under this character, ready him.

name: Webby Vanderquack
text:
Shift 2 {I} (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Webby Vanderquack.)
Ward
WORK SMARTER Whenever this character quests, if an opponent has more cards in their inkwell than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: So Be It!
text: Each of your characters gets +1 {S} for this turn. You may banish an item of your choice.
flavor_text: He's a patient merman, but only up to a point.

name: Trust In Me
text:
(You may {E} a character that costs 6 or more to sing this song for free.)
Choose one:
- Each opposing character gets -1 {E} until the start of your next turn.
- Each opponent discards 2 cards.

name: Chomp!
text: Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
flavor_text:
Mickey: "What IS that thing?!"
Goofy: "It's hungry, that's what!"

name: Frighteningly Terrible
text:
(You may {E} a character that costs 3 or more to have them sing this song for free.)
Place 1 damage counter on each opposing character.
flavor_text: My smile is dangerous.

name: Potion Of Malice
text:
SUPPRESSED ANGER {E}, 1 {I} – Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.
MINDLESS RAGE {E}, Banish this item – Each opposing damaged character gains Reckless until the start of your next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

name: Inscrutable Map
text: BACKTRACK {}, 1{} – Chosen opposing character gets -1 {} until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text:
Nick: "What kind of nonsense is this?"
Judy: "These symbols must mean something..."

name: Enigmatic Inkcaster
text: ITS OWN REWARD {E} – If you've played 2 or more cards this turn, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "Whoever's room this was, I think we just found their inkcaster." —Shanzay, an Illumineer

name: Diablo
flavor_text: "Be careful when gathering herbs in the Inkwell Caverns. You never know who's watching." –Hana's Herborium

name: Peter Pan
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "Wanna race? Last one through the Inkwell Caverns is a codfish!"

name: Mother Gothel
text: SOMEONE HAS TO MAKE USE OF THIS If a character was banished this turn, this character gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: "The world is a cruel place, and sometimes you have to be a little cruel to get by."

name: Hermes
text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: "What do you mean, 'late'? Kid, I was ahead of my time before time was invented."

name: Beast
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
THAT'S MINE Whenever he challenges another character, if there's a card under this character, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.

name: Bronx
text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Tinker Bell
text:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
HARMLESS DIVERSION When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.

name: Goliath
text:
BE CAREFUL, ALL OF YOU Whenever one of your Gargoyle characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Brooklyn
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.
flavor_text: "If they think we're beasts and monsters . . ."

name: Elisa Maza
text: SPECIAL DETAIL While you have 2 or more other characters in play with 5 {S} or more, this character gets +2 {L}.
flavor_text: "Now, you can let me look the place over, or I can come back with a warrant and a lot more cops. Your call."

name: Aladdin
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
ONLY THE BOLD While there's a card under this character, your characters with Reckless gain "{E} — Gain 1 lore."

name: Lady Tremaine
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPEDIENT SCHEMES Whenever this character quests, if you've put a card under her this turn, you may play an action with cost 5 or less from your discard for free, then put that action card on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard.

name: Shere Khan
text:
Shift 5 {} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Shere Khan.)
WILD RAGE 1 {I}, Deal 1 damage to this character — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Next Stop, Olympus
text:
ACTION If you have a character with 5 {S} or more in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this action.
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. The next time they challenge another character this turn, gain 1 lore.

name: Dragon Fire
text: Banish chosen character.
flavor_text: Never underestimate the wrath of a dragon.

name: Mushu's Rocket
text:
I NEED FIREPOWER When you play this item, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
HITCH A RIDE 2 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character gains Rush this turn.

name: The Bitterwood
text: GATHER RESOURCES Once during your turn, whenever you move a character with 5 {S} or more here, you may draw a card.

name: Hen Wen
text: FUTURE SIGHT Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text:
She's a special pig, Taran.
—Dallben

name: Anna
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Come on—there's tons to do! Skating and snow forts and sledding and hot chocolate!"

name: Genie
flavor_text: "You know, books are usually much more exciting when you read the pages in the right order..."

name: Eureka
text: WARD (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text: "Wow! The wind is picking up. I should have brought a sweater!"

name: Jasmine
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
UPLIFTING AURA Whenever this character quests, if there’s a card under her, remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

name: Judy Hopps
text:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Judy Hopps.)
LATERAL THINKING During your turn, your Detective characters gain Alert and Resist +2. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: The Sultan
flavor_text: Never mind what the Curator intended these trinkets for; the sultan found his own use for them soon enough.

name: Scar
text: Boost 2 {} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2{} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.) SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST Whenever you put a card under this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {} this turn.

name: Daisy Duck
text:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Daisy Duck.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
STRANGE HAPPENINGS While this character is exerted, cards enter opponents' inkwells exerted.

name: Cinderella
text: WHATEVER YOU WISH FOR At the end of your turn, if you played a Princess character this turn, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown to draw a card.

name: Judy Hopps
text: THOROUGH INVESTIGATION When you play this character and whenever she quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Detective character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Pluto
text: ON THE TRAIL {E} - If you have a Detective character in play, return an item card from your discard to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.
flavor_text: Every detective can use an assistant to sniff out clues.

name: Kristoff
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck under this card, facedown.)
A TREASURE THAT MUST BE EARNED Whenever this character quests, if there is a card under it, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell, facedown and exerted.

name: Mickey Mouse
text: GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: The clues all pointed toward ghosts, but he knew there was something more going on here.

name: Hen Wen's Visions
text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom in any order.
flavor_text:
"Hen Wen, from you I do beseech
Knowledge that lies beyond my reach . . ."
– Taran

name: Promising Lead
text: Chosen character gets +1 {L} and gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "The books on these pages match up with those shelves. And the ley lines... The answer's right here!" —Judy Hopps

name: Might Solve A Mystery
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 1 character card and up to 1 item card and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Ink Amplifier
text: ENERGY CAPTURE Whenever an opponent draws a card during their turn, if it's the second card they've drawn this turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: With a crackle of energy, the strange device lit up when the glimmers entered the study.

name: Fairy Godmother's Wand
text: ONLY TILL MIDNIGHT During your turn, whenever you put a card into your inkwell, chosen Princess character of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavor_text: Sometimes a glimpse is all you need.

name: Inkrunner
text:
PREFLIGHT CHECK When you play this item, draw a card.
READY TO RIDE {E}, 1 {I} - Chosen character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

name: Robin Hood
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2 chosen characters.

name: Donald
text: RAISE A RUCKUS When you play this character, choose a Detective character to gain Challenger +2 for the rest of this turn. (While challenging, that character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: "Let's show those cursed ghosts who's in charge! You go first."

name: Goliath
text:
DUSK TO DAWN At the end of each player's turn, if they have more than 2 cards in their hand, they choose and discard cards until they have 2. If they have fewer than 2 cards in their hand, they draw until they have 2.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Francine
text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: Francine stared at the torn page, trying to take her mind off Higgins and his pursuit of the littering mastermind. Was he ready for the danger of undercover work?

name: Inspector Tezuka
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text:
"Stand back. I'll handle this."
– Inspector Tezuka

name: Basil
text: HOLD YOUR GROUND Whenever you play another Detective character, this character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: "It's time to make a stand!"

name: Hudson
text:
FINDING ANSWERS When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Minnie Mouse
text: SEARCH THE SHADOWS When you play this character, chosen Detective character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)
flavor_text: It's hard to catch a ghost without going somewhere spooky.

name: Lexington
text: Alert (This character can challenge as if they had Evasive.) STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: David Xanatos
text: MINOR INCONVENIENCE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: "A plan only fails when you don't learn from it. And my plans never fail." -David Xanatos

name: The Twins
text: TWO FOR ONE When you play this character, if you have a location in play, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text:
"Hooray! A whole new forest to be lost in!"
"Yeah, lost in!"

name: Nick Wilde
text: Shift 3 {} (You may pay 3 {} to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.) CASE CLOSED During your turn, whenever one of your Detective characters banishes another character in a challenge, draw a card.

name: Prince Charming
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
PROTECTIVE PRESENCE Each turn, only one character can challenge.

name: Broadway
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can’t ready.

name: Fairy Godmother
text:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
STUNNING TRANSFORMATION Whenever you put a card under this character, you may banish chosen opposing character. If you do, their player may reveal the top card of their deck. If that card is a character or item card, they may play it for free. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

name: Zeus
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I NEED MORE THUNDERBOLTS! While there's a card under this character, he gets +2 {S} and +2 {W}.

name: But I'm Much Faster
text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Alert and Challenger +2 this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

name: Putting It All Together
text: Chosen opposing character can't challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Okay, so the ghostly glimmers were first seen here, and the trail of torn lorebook pages started in this part of the Illuminary . . ."
— Judy Hopps

name: The Robot Queen
text: MAJOR MALFUNCTION Whenever you play a character, you may pay 1 {} and banish this item to deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text:
"To our beloved Queen this gift we send,
As her 60-year reign comes to an end."
—Note delivered with the robot queen

name: The Sword Of Hercules
text:
MIGHTY HIT When you play this item, banish chosen opposing Deity character.
HAND-TO-HAND During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, gain 1 lore.

name: Ingenious Device
text:
SOUVENIR {E}, 2 {I}, banish this item — Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
TIME FLIES During your turn, when this item is banished, deal 3 damage to a character or a location of your choice.

name: Illuminary
text:
SUBTERRANEAN NETWORK 1 {} for each other location you
FOCUS While you have a chara

name: Zootopia
text: NEW INFORMATION Once per turn, when you play a character here, you may draw a card.

name: Gaston
text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
TOP THAT! Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, chosen opposing character can't challenge and must quest if able during their next turn.

name: The Horned King
text: GRAND MACHINATIONS During your turn, if 1 or more cards have left a player's discard this turn, this character gets +2 {}.
flavor_text: "Only moments away from victory."

name: Megara
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I’LL BE FINE While there’s a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains "Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card."

name: Robin Hood
text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2 chosen characters.

name: Simba
text:
Boost 3 {I}
TIMELY ALLIANCE Whenever you put a card under this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Black Cauldron
text:
THE CAULDRON CALLS {E}, 1 {I} – Put a character card from your discard under this item faceup.
RISE AND JOIN ME! {E}, 1 {I} – This turn, you may play characters from under this item.

name: Demona
text:
AD SAXUM COMMUTATE When you play this character, exert all opposing characters. Then, each player with fewer than 3 cards in their hand draws until they have 3.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

name: Ariel
text:
Boost 1 {I}
COMMAND PERFORMANCE Once during your turn, whenever you play a song, if there's a card under this character, you may draw a card.

name: Hades
text: WHAT D'YA SAY? When you play this character, you may choose an opposing character. If you do, draw 2 cards unless that character's player puts that card on the bottom of their deck.
